synopsis.text:
When living on Mars becomes more than just surviving for 16-year-old Joe Maya, he finds himself in the midst of an intergalactic conflict between the conquering forces of Planet Zaboom and the royalty of Planet Radorio. After witnessing an intense battle between extraterrestrial beings, Joe encounters a princess who has crash-landed on Mars in an attempt to escape the clutches of the power-hungry emperor of Zaboom.

With his life taking an unexpected turn, Joe and his friends are thrust into a battle for the universe, wielding three formidable mecha beasts against the seemingly insurmountable forces of Zaboom. As hope dwindles, a mysterious ninja robot named Tobikage emerges from the shadows, offering a glimmer of salvation. With the ability to merge with the mechanical beasts, Tobikage bestows unmatched power upon Joe and his allies.

As the fight against the emperor of Zaboom intensifies, questions arise surrounding the enigmatic Tobikage. Who controls this mysterious entity, and where did it come from? In this thrilling adventure, Joe and his friends must combine their strengths and courage to protect the princess, defeat the evil emperor, and restore peace to the cosmos.
